connect20/conversionbug_cookiebaseproduc.name: connect20/ConversionBug_Cookiebaseproduct

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/conversionbug_cookiebaseproduc.description: The cookies based recently viewed products extension keeps a track of the products viewed by the visitor and shows the recently viewed products in a product carousel on the website.
